doc:
Jimmy Aubrey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jimmy_Aubrey 0 Jimmy Aubrey (23 October 1887 in Bolton, Lancashire, England – 2 September 1983 in Woodland Hills, California) was an English actor who worked with both Charlie Chaplin and Laurel and Hardy, having gone with Fred Karno's company to America. However he left to start on his own in Vaudeville. He started in comedies, then went on to comedic roles in drama. He appeared in 419 films between 1915 and 1953. Jimmy_Aubrey ( 23_October_1887 in Bolton , Lancashire , England – 2_September_1983 in Woodland_Hills , California ) was an_English_actor who worked with both_Charlie_Chaplin and Laurel_and_Hardy , having_gone with Fred_Karno 's_company to America . However he left_to_start on his_own in Vaudeville . He started in comedies , then went on to comedic_roles in drama . He appeared in 419_films between 1915_and_1953 .
